* Iron Raptor stepped back as Plintissa spritsed ink onto the floor and into 
Rampage's optics, she shook her head and snarled in anger!*

" You fool! Now look what you've done!!!"

* Iron Raptor stood back and straightened her stance, it was time to test 
out her Second Beast Mode! She knew that it was a huge waste of energy but 
Plintissa and her couldn't beat Rampage like this.*

" Second Beast Mode!!!"

* Within seconds she had transformed into a two story exoskeleton creature, 
black as night and hard as alloy. ( Ever seen the movie Alien? Looks like 
one of them except with a raptor claw on the third toe.) She came up behind 
Rampage and bared her teeth, her head now 3 times bigger then his. A plate 
of bone covered her neck and half her back, vertebral spikes ran down her 
back and tail.
Iron Raptor knew that she only had roughly 5 clicks before the energy drain 
would force her back into her normal Beast Mode and maybe even stasis lock, 
so she had to act NOW!!!
Within seconds she sank her 6 inch teeth into Rampage's shoulder-plate.*
